articles.title: First study in North America uses genetic testing to identify people at risk of heart disease - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Dignity Health in Arizona is launching the first research study in North America in which genetic testing is used to identify men and women at risk of developing heart disease based on the makeup of their DNA.

articles.title: Harris: Americans will 'incur some costs' from Ukraine crisis as energy costs, inflation soar - Fox Business
articles.description: Vice President Kamala Harris warned that Americans could feel some 'costs' of a Russian invasion of Ukraine, unwelcome news to many who are already bearing the costs of soaring inflation.

articles.title: 'We're doing everything we can to survive': As the US looks to move on from Covid-19, high-risk and disabled Americans feel forgotten - CNN
articles.description: Tasha Nelson's 10-year-old son held back tears when he heard the news. The two were in the car when the announcement came through the radio: Virginia's freshly sworn-in governor had signed an order attempting to ban mask mandates in schools.
